entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Gravenhurst
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:08 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -0.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Muskoka Airport 07:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -0.3°C
Pressure: 101.1 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 55 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -8.2°C
Wind: ESE 21 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning. Snow beginning late this morning. Snow mixed with ice pellets late this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain this afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain showers or flurries. Low zero.
entry.summary: Rain showers changing to flurries after midnight. Local blowing snow overnight. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 70 late this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Clearing late in the afternoon. Local blowing snow in the morning. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High plus 3. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
